name: Bonkers
overview: A group of Earthlings are trapped in the upper regions of an alien space station. They have to reach five air locks at the bottom to escape. This may sound simple, but those horrible aliens are holding a creepy creatures convention and they will all join together to make it increasingly difficult for you to help the Earthlings. Watch out for the Double Gangers, a Pac-Droid, Squidge-Droid, a Stomper, Baby-Droid, a deadly space ship and two other mystery guests.
